status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine remained in **Normal Operation** for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, with consistently **near‑zero and very stable power output** (power_mean −0.0024, low power_std 0.0009) alongside a relatively **high average pitch angle** (pitch_mean 24.0). Wind conditions were generally low on average (wind_speed_mean 1.64, std 0.57) but included an **isolated high wind-speed spike** (wind_speed_max 17.2) that does not coincide with a notable change in mean power behavior. A persistent operational pattern is **large yaw misalignment on average** (yaw_misalignment_mean 67.6; tagged), with moderate variability in rotor speed (rotor_rpm_std 0.64) and higher variability at the generator (generator_rpm_std 83.3), while temperatures were steady around 35.0°C and the power residual stayed positively biased (mean 0.1147).
